name: proposify-hackathon-vanhack-fair
description: By doing a research, I discovered that one of the problems that users complain about Proposify, is the capability of multiple users editing the document at the same time. This project uses a javascript plugin (realtime-editor), socket.io and node.js to help users about this problem, making them capable of editing their propositions simultaneously.
author: Allisson Ferreira Soares Santos
